42029.summary: Some customers in White Rock (Whiterock Community Centre) are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
42029.title: Sept 20 – White Rock (Whiterock Community Centre) | Internet Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

42019.summary: Some customers in the Northwood area of Thunder Bay are experiencing an interruption to their Internet services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
